--- mattwo7 <Matfour@...> wrote:

> I joined a long time ago and must've lost interest,  how do I join?
> 
> 

Hello Mat,
     Do you have a particular character in mind to play?
Some of the things that might help you are: Reading the information on
the  Wiki site, thinking about what character you want, what faction
they would belong to (remember we have sub-factions here) and design a
good way for him or her to enter (some of us fell to earth others had
other interesting beginings).

I hope this helps, and I will leave anything I have forgotten or
misstated to the others. 

Oh, and WELCOME BACK!!!

Wiki site: http://wikihost.org/wikis/nbwrpg_wiki/wiki/start

Preston
